ctx: intros Q a b c nZb nZc p q r r1 s1 H H0 H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b, c : Term A n nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c p, q, r, r1, s1 : list (Term A n) H : Confluent Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) c r) H0 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q) r1 H1 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a c nZc p r) s1 Unable to unify "Prop" with "eqP A eqA n r1 s1".

exceptions.tactic: apply (reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q) r1).
